title: Setup pyproject.toml with project metadata
description: Create comprehensive pyproject.toml with project metadata, dependencies, build system (hatchling/setuptools), entry points, and tool configurations. Include proper versioning, author info, license (MIT/Apache-2.0), and URLs for open-source project.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Created comprehensive pyproject.toml with:

**Build System:**
- Hatchling build backend
- Proper package discovery for src/ layout

**Project Metadata:**
- Version 0.1.0 with PyPI classifiers
- Python 3.10+ requirement
- MIT license
- Complete URLs (homepage, docs, repository, issues)

**Dependencies:**
- Core: textual, langchain, click, pydantic
- AI providers: langchain-openai, langchain-anthropic, langchain-google-genai
- Config: pydantic-settings, python-dotenv

**Optional Dependencies:**
- dev: pytest, ruff, mypy, pre-commit
- test: pytest suite with coverage
- docs: sphinx with RTD theme
- security: safety, bandit

**CLI Entry Point:**
- consoul command â†’ consoul.__main__:main

**Tool Configurations:**
- Pytest: strict mode, coverage reporting, test markers
- Coverage: 80%+ target, branch coverage
- Ruff: modern linting/formatting rules
- Mypy: strict type checking
- Bandit: security scanning config
